001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx;
002
003import org.reactivestreams.Publisher;
004
005import java.io.Closeable;
006
007/**
008 * For lower-level, higher-performance reactive subscriptions to blockchain data where we don't
009 * want the overhead of parsing (and instantiating as a tree of objects) each block or transaction.
010 * (e.g. a proxy or relay server)
011 *
012 *  Note: Implementation instances may throw {@link UnsupportedOperationException} if they don't support a particular
013 *  stream type.
014 */
015public interface RxBlockchainBinaryService extends Closeable {
016    Publisher<byte[]> transactionBinaryPublisher();
017    Publisher<byte[]> transactionHashBinaryPublisher();
018    Publisher<byte[]> blockBinaryPublisher();
019    Publisher<byte[]> blockHashBinaryPublisher();
020}
